Replying to @StuRobson 2019-09-28 15:16
@StuRobson I always go jam first. I stand by it. It adheres best to the scone instead of dislodging the cream. And the cream on top makes for the best mouth-feel. But YMMV. The right way to eat a cream tea is the way that makes you most happy.
